column4: Jokes: I tried, it didn't work. I tried using a cd and boot from it, I don't get past the install option. I also tried doing an upgrade from 10.10 to 11.04. The upgrade went through, after the reboot the same issue with the black screen happened and nothing on the screen for me to look at.
Jokes: That is what I am thinking about Jokes, the alternate cd!
But I don't want to lose all my settings and stuff from 10.10 :-(
You could backup your home (should do that in any case) and install / on a new partition leaving the old one in place if you wan't to go back.
